name: Goplus Foldable Ping Pong Table, 100% Preassembled, Table Tennis Table with Net, 2 Paddles, Ping Pong Balls, Portable Table Tennis Game Set for Indoor Outdoor
short_description: 【Foldable Design for Easy Storage】 With a foldable design, this ping pong table can fold flat for space-saving storage when not in use, or for use on the go, making it ideal for small apartments, dorms, and more. Table dimension: 48” x 31” x 25.5”-32.5” (L x W x H). The integrated safety lock ensures secure folding so there is no risk of pinched fingers or accidental openings.

【3-Level Adjustable Height】 Whether accommodating the varying needs of children or adults, the adjustable feature ensures comfortable gameplay for all players. Moreover, no tools are required for height adjustments. Tabletop height: 21.5"/55 cm, 26.5"/67 cm, 28.5"/72 cm.

【High-Quality Construction】Built with a sturdy aluminum frame, this table tennis table is designed to withstand both indoor and outdoor play. The reinforced leg locks and anti-slip, anti-scratch foot pads ensure stability and longevity.
【All-in-One Game Set】 This table tennis game table is equipped with everything needed to start the game right out of the box. This complete game set includes 1 net, 2 paddles, and 2 balls.

【Applicable to Various Scenarios】 Whether it's at home, school, the office, or outdoor gatherings, this ping-pong table is the perfect choice to easily adapt to different environments and crowds, providing an excellent entertainment experience for friendly matches.
product_description: Description This table-tennis table is the best gift for table-tennis lovers! Compared with the traditional one, this table-tennis table makes an innovative breakthrough. Its foldable design makes it more convenient for both storage and carry, and makes the assembly tool-free. Premium table top gives a fine bounce to the ping-pong ball, increasing the game experience. Stable structure allows intense play without overturning. Besides, 1 net, 2 professional ping-pong bats, and ping-pong balls are included. Buy it home and start your game now!
